title: FS: Beautiful Raw N29 Buck Ewing
author: btcarfagno

posts.post_title: FS: Beautiful Raw N29 Buck Ewing
posts.post_content:
If this does not sell I will send it off to grading. I do not know their tendencies for grading N29 cards, so I do not know how they will view the left edge half way up to the top...where it looks like some sort of rubbing has happened. Hopefully the scan shows in in good detail. Please judge condition for yourself. Not taking the left edge into consideration, this is an EX-MT+ or NM card.

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains099/Scan_20150711_zpsb9inclo6.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy203/collectiblesgains/collectiblesgains099/Scan_20150711%202_zpsntppsy3m.jpg[/IMG]

Asking $925 delivered.

Tom C

Please note...for what it's worth I was informed by the person from whom I got the card that this card had been cracked out of a PSA 5 holder.

Tom C

Bump with price reduction.

Tom C
